Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no official document from the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) stating that bank accounts will be blocked if NPR document is not submitted.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that failing to submit the NPR document will result in bank account blockage, but this assumption is not supported by official sources.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation provided by Alt News, which states that the NPR document is not mandatory for KYC and is considered an optional document.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that an RBI spokesperson has dismissed the viral message and clarified that the information has no basis.
Understate: There is no evidence of understating bias in the provided claim.
Exaggerate: There is no evidence of exaggeration bias in the provided claim.
Falters at times: There is no evidence of the claim faltering at times.
